column1: Little Goat Diner////My wife couldn't resist the temptation of the Bull's Eye French Toast - french toast made with onion brioche served with chicken
column2: gooseberries and a BBQ maple syrup.  Delish and rich!  The only complaint she had was that she wished she had known an egg was inside that had a runny yoke.  Not being one for the yoke in a sunny-side up egg
column4: and being in the minority of the rest of the diners
